title: HOUR 1 - NBA Finals, Tatum, Steelers, PGA
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - NBA Finals, Tatum, Steelers, PGA
description:
Preview of game 6 of the NBA Finals tonight

Jayson Tatum isn't a superstar yet

Thoughts on Minkah Fitzpatrick new deal and the Steelers

The PGA isn't as powerful as they think


Guest: Danny Green
